title: MIVAVAHA AMPITIAVANA

verses.1:
Kivy ve raha vao mifoha
Vesaran'entana,
Manjombona koa ny andro
Andeha mivavaka.
verses.2:
Marobe ireo adidy
Izay miandry anao,
Ny hany tena fahendrena
Mitok√†na am-bavaka.
verses.3:
Mivembena ve hianao
Satria reraka;
Hahazo hery vaovao
Raha toa mivavaka.
verses.4:
Miezaha hatrany hianao
Tsy hiato hivavaka
Hahery na dia toa reraka;
Mivavaha lalandava.

chorus:
Raha vao mangiran-dratsy
Amin'ny antoandro;
Ny hariva ihany koa
Mivavaha am-pitiavana.
